issue.title: [Python] Extend Table.filter to accept Expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16469](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16469). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If `Table.filter` receives an expression, it should invoke `{}_exec_plan.filter_table{`}.

Also extend the docstring to reflect this change.
